metadata.Title: CVE-2012-4885 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
The wikitext parser in MediaWiki 1.17.x before 1.17.3 and 1.18.x before1.18.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop)via certain input, as demonstrated by the padleft function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-4885` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.19.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.19.1-1').
